summary: Completed frontend testing of Gaming Zone Booking System. Homepage and basic navigation work well with excellent cyberpunk design. Critical Firebase Firestore issues preventing data loading and admin access. Login authentication flow works but session persistence and admin role verification have issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Database '(default)' not found. Please check your project configuration.
critical_bugs.impact: No data loading - zones, games, bookings all affected

critical_bugs.issue: Admin dashboard not accessible even after successful login
Missing or insufficient permissions when seeding data
critical_bugs.impact: Cannot initialize database with sample data

ui_bugs.issue: Indefinite loading when Firebase database is misconfigured
User session not persisting across page navigation
ui_bugs.impact: Users get redirected to login frequently

integration_issues.issue: Admin role verification not working properly despite successful login

passed_tests: Homepage loads with neon cyberpunk design
Register page loads with proper form
Mobile hamburger menu opens and displays links
success_percentage: frontend: 40% - Core UI works but Firebase integration broken
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix Firebase Firestore configuration - database not found error. 2. Fix admin role authentication and session persistence. 3. Configure proper Firebase security rules for seeding functionality. 4. Investigate why admin dashboard is not accessible after login.
